name: Planetary Defense (itch) (griffin22)
description:
DESCRIPTION

A space shooter clone made with SFML. I made this game to experiment with SFML and what it can do. Feel free to look at the source code here.

STORY

Earth is about to be bombarded by an asteroid swarm. You are tasked to stop the asteroids no matter the costs.

CREDITS

Ship texture - Irmandito

Background music - LHSchiptunes
